content: Our focus was on early season sun execution internationally, strengthening our digital activation and e-commerce presence and supporting innovation and new products, including our Barber's Style launch across Europe and grooming product expansion in the United States for the Edge and Cremo brands, a growing top line, strengthening gross margin profile and a demonstrated focus on cost reduction, all enable a sustained ability to invest in our brands and we are seeing the return from our investments. Please go ahead with your question. Operator, next question please. Please go ahead with your question. Operator, next question please. Please go ahead with your question.
